# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a multipolyline object using the provided polylines.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ polylines: [MKPolyline])
```

## Parameters

- **polylines**: An array of [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKPolyline] objects to initialize the object with.
title: init(_:)
